internship.title: Dsa Training
description: Gained in-depth knowledge of Data Structures and Algorithms, including their practical applications and optimization techniques.
Developed skills in designing efficient algorithms for problem-solving and coding challenges.
Proficient in using various data structures such as arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, graphs, and hash tables.
Learned to analyze and optimize the time and space complexity of algorithms.
Worked effectively in team settings, contributing to group projects and participating in peer code reviews.
Improved communication, time management, and analytical thinking skills through regular group discussions and presentations.
Completed multiple projects involving real-world scenarios and applied learned concepts to develop efficient solutions.

projects.name: Twitter- Social Media Platform
description: Developed a full-featured Twitter clone with the MERN stack, including user authentication and real-time updates.
Implemented RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express.js for efficient handling of user data, posts, likes, and comments.
Developed front-end components using React, ensuring a dynamic and interactive user experience.

projects.name: AI Rudra Chatbot
description: Built a React JS AI chatbot which can respond to our prompt.
It is capable of writing code and fixing error codes.
It fetches the response from Gemini-Pro.

education.institution: St Xavier’s Sr Sec High School
